title: Episode 239: Keep it in the Family (Feat. Dre & LaShonda)
itunes:title: Episode 239: Keep it in the Family (Feat. Dre & LaShonda)
description:
Dre and LaShonda from OWN's "Family or Fiance" join the ladies of Lip Service this week. They open up about overcoming issues with best friends being disrespectful, that time they were caught having sex by their children, and much more. Make sure to watch "Family or Fiance" Sundays at 9/8c on the Oprah Winfrey Network. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
